item.title: How do people decide whether or not to read a tweet?
item.description: It turns out that an existing relationship with the author of the tweet is one of the main factors influencing how someone decidesÂ whether or not to read a tweet. At the same time, a large number associated with a tweet can also make the tweet more attractive to readers. Our latest Open Access research has discovered how much effect the information about a tweet has on whether people decide to read it or not.
